summary: Hannes is an old man who has grown apart from his children. Recently retired when his wife gets ill he tries to reconcile with them and to atone for his cold demeanor in the past.
cast: Auður Drauma Bachmann|Þorsteinn Bachmann|Kristín Davíðsdóttir|Benedikt Erlingsson|Elma Lísa Gunnarsdóttir|Þröstur Leó Gunnarsson|Harald G. Haraldsson|Margrét Helga Jóhannsdóttir|Theodór Júlíusson|Björn Karlsson|Vigdís Hrefna Pálsdóttir|Jóhann Sigurðarson|Þór Tulinius|Ágúst Örn B. Wigum|Katla M. Þorgeirsdóttir
title: Eldfjall
